title: Screen Design:  "Ceremonial," Front Side
medium: Graphite, yellow crayon on squared white tracing paper
description: Five panel screen on squared ground.  From left to right:  panel with irregular lower left edge, semicircular protrusion upper left edge and wavy protrusion upper edge; panel with up-side-down cello-like form at right edge and crown upper edge; panel with semi-circular cut out at right edge with triangular shape upper edge; panel with semi-circular cut out at left edge (forming circle with panel to left), small circular cut out upper center with crescent moon with doll at upper edge.
name: Drawing
